page.title: 03Population Study.
page.content: Population Study - Letham Village. In Letham there is a population of 149. Of these, 6 are pre-school children, 32 school children and 32 of retiral age. Only 2 people are unemployed. Those who work are engaged in a variety of occupations: teachers, nurses, social workers, farmers, joiners, engineers, architects and computer managers. We also have a local artist. By far the most popular hobby is gardening. Ladies enjoy knitting, sewing and wine-making. Other hobbies listed are swimming, dancing jogging, golf, fishing, shooting and model aeroplane building. People move to the village because of its pleasant rural setting and easy access to nearby towns and cities.
